Claim: "The woman has a green headscarf, blue shirt, and a very big grin."
Referring expressions: Woman, green headscarf, blue shirt, big grin.  Woman, shot
Formula: (exists a ((IsWearingGreenHeadscarf(a) and HasBigGrin(a)) or (HasBlueShirt(a) and IsWearingGreenHeadscarf(a)))) -> (exists a (HasBeenShot(a)))
